reviews.sentence: first class venue as usual. All our stays at MANTRA are first class however our tri yearlyvisits are to attend medical appointments and we are findingthe increased tariffs are becoming harder to afford at the timesof year that we must attend. We will continue to patronise MANTRA CHATSWOD until we can not afford to do so.

Great Stay. It was 200 metres from railway station round the corner from my uncles birthday venue close to shops. Comfortable and handy to railway station. The shopping centre was lovely and I liked the family atmosphere of the Chatswod suburb.

Great Venue for Workshops. Thank you very much for looking after our morning workshop so well. We came from interstate and found the location and the venue very appealing. I would recommend Mantra Chatswod to anyone hosting an event in the Chatswod area.

Great Venue for Workshops. Thank you very much for looking after our morning workshop so well. We came from interstate and found the location and the venue very appealing. I would recommend Mantra Chatswod to anyone hosting an event in the Chatswod area.

Convenience and comfort. It was very conveniently located close to our venue for our church rally so we only had to park the car in the hotel secure parking and then walk. Very friendly and helpful staff. A little bit noisy out on the street but I just put my ear plugs in. The parking was a bit expensive.
Convenience of the Mantra. Absolutely perfect for a work conference at the zenith theatre. Close to transport and surrounded by retail and restaurants.

Comfortable. I was very comfortable in lovely surroundings. The room was clean and exceeded my expectations. The location was perfect for my needs as the conference I attended was at the Concourse. The service was excellent and I have absolutely no complaints. Thank you.

Great Stay. I have stay at this accommodation venue on a number of occasions and i have not been disappointed. Great location next to the railway so easy to go anywhere next to major shopping venues also. Strongly recommended.
Good catering and meeting facilities.
Old and needed a refurbishment. Good location but everything except the foyer was old yellowing and cringeworthy.
Great location comfortable rooms good value. Overall fine. Foyer is small and seemed to very crowded when I arrived but no further issues throughout the stay.

Satsfactory. I do not stay in hotels much but stayed because I was attending a function there. The rooms are starting to look a bit old and our rooms had a musty smell like when someone has left the washing machine closed for a while. This was not relieved by fresh air. Everything was clean though. The key for the door was a bit of a thing though. I had it replaced three times in the space of two days. This did not affect my stay much all I wanted was a bed and somewhere to make breakfast. The shower was great.

Sadly Disappointing. I have stayed in your hotel many times and have tried many others in Chatswod the Meriton Quest and more recently the Silkari but I ’ve come back to the Mantra as my previous experience have been good value for money. This time however I was in the middle of a building site yet there was no mention of this on checkin. I used the washing machine only to find the dryer did n’t work and hence worn wet clothes to work the following day and my breakfast arrived less milk and butter. It was a cold night and each time I had to go to the foyer the doors were open the wind was blistering and I felt sorry for your frozen reception team. The only saving grace was that your staff were ‘ pleasant ’ nothing to write home about just vanilla. Your business and property needs a full reset and refresh.

It was Ok. Positives Friendly staff great location and rooms were clean. Negatives Hotel needs an urgent refurbishment particularly the carpets in the foyer hallways and rooms. Gym needs new and better equipment. They say first impressions count and that is what is letting your hotel down.
Average. Room was clean but run down. Needed c o at of paint. Foyer dirty and uninviting.

Clean and tidy but not well suited to the business customer. The room was good but a few things that did n’t work well for me as a frequent traveler earliest room service breakfast was 7 730am which I selected but breakfast did n’t arrive until 734am after I was informed at 725am that they did n’t have my preferred juice no plug for the sink in the bathroom making it more difficult to shave. I arrived back from a meeting at 945am and found cleaners already turning over my room even though I had n’t checked out yet. Great location though.

Refurbished room but air conditioner was poor. Overall pleasant though being put into a room which had a barely functioning air conditioner especially when I start at the hotel regularly was disappointing.

If only Acor Plus could just earn a C. Mantra hotels are to a standard. But Acor Plus claim to be the best across the gamet of the hotels they offer. Where Acor fall down consistently is across the web site and direct customer knowledge. Sitting Australia and logging on with my usual email URL you might expect that the web site would know who and where Iam but no all too often pricing is in US and when ever you try to take advantage of the 1 night free acom you get pushed well outside the locale you want into the lower standard chains that Acor have on the books. So lets face it is about the only value you get for 370 membership if your a 10 night or so per year person aside from the 50 off meals but that not in all establishments try getting an evening meal in and IBIS. And when you pay a big premium and then see the same offer 2 hours later for 40 less well that is galling.
Good. Nicely refurbished. Staff were poor maintenance in foyer given wrong room key ironing board broke but too 24 hrs to get it fixed.

Very ordinary. Check in was friendly though with the loud music plying in the foyer I could not her a word the receptionist said. Complete refurbishment does not mean a new carpet. The dishwasher was broken and filthy. The toaster had no handle. The toilet seat was yellow and dirty. The bathroom was old and dirty.
